node.prompt: There's an enemy signal nearby, it'll show up on your radar soon I'm sure. Prepare to defend yourself and the honour of the empire criminal! Your mining laser should be enough to take down these weaklings, just... try not to explode...

Your ship can take a few hits thanks to the shield (see the purple bar?). But any hull damage beyond that (the red bar) is permanent. You can repair the hull with a little iron in the station if you need to. Good luck criminal!
I'll lock up the station till the pirates are gone, so don't you try hiding in there now! F.R.I.E.N.D out!
